src_original: tasmai (Pp_109) vaidyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dadyāt /  tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /  tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet?
gāḍhataraṃ tasya puruṣasya glānyaṃ bhavet,  yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
bhagavānāha- evameva kāśyapa sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam /
